project.name: tldr-extension
project.description: Chrome extension that summarizes articles with one click using Chrome AI + Groq fallback

features.name: Article Extraction
features.description: Extract article content from web pages using Mozilla Readability.js
acceptance_criteria: Detects if page is an article using isProbablyReaderable

features.name: Chrome AI Integration
features.description: Primary AI provider using Chrome's built-in Gemini Nano Summarizer API
acceptance_criteria: Detects Chrome AI availability via ai.summarizer.capabilities()
Parses Chrome AI output into standard format

features.name: Groq API Fallback
features.description: Fallback AI provider using Groq's fast Llama 3.1 inference
acceptance_criteria: JSON response format with clever prompting
Error handling for rate limits and invalid keys

features.name: Popup UI
features.description: Extension popup with summary display and actions

features.name: Options Page
features.description: Settings page for API key configuration
acceptance_criteria: Groq API key input with visibility toggle

features.name: Summary Caching
features.description: Cache summaries in chrome.storage.local for instant re-access
